value:
Odd... The map says there should be
land over here.

I was raised in the mountains of
Ordelia territory, so I don't know
much about beach life.

Just look at that horizon, huh?
I wonder if that's where the souls of
mercs go after they're gone.

I feel a bit exposed in just this.
But I guess the light weight makes it
good for training.

I just passed a stall selling frozen
dessert. In this heat, I can see that
being a money maker.

I'm Shez. A mercenary. I was hired
to deliver this chilled drink from
$Nf.

There's a big wave coming, and I'm
gonna catch it!

When it comes to training, I never
take a vacation.

Ugh. I think all the warm coastal air is
making me soft.

I'm finally getting to learn some
aquatic fighting techniques!

I'm Shez. I take it you're hiring me
for a fight on the water. Not like I
have a choice, but... Hm? A vacation?

I might be a bit green, but I've been
a merc long enough to see my share
of battlefields.$k$pThis line of work's taken me to all
sorts of settings.$k$pFrom barren fields with no crops
to gleaming lakes and majestic,
snow-capped mountains.$k$pAnd you know what those places
have in common? They all look like
hell when the fighting starts.$k$pFortunately, our little stretch of
paradise here in Askr is far out of
the way of battle.$k$pAnd personally, I aim to keep it
that way. That's our job as Heroes
anyway, right?$k$pI know it might be strange for
someone who profits off war to talk
about peace...$k$pBut after we're done with this
little outing, I really hope this beach
stays as serene as we found it.
Yeah!
Whoa!
You wanna get splashed?
Time to ride that wave!
This'll be a clean sweep!
Go with the flow!
Forgot to stretch...
Something to be said for taking the time to just unwind every once in a while.
Hey, quit poking me! This sunburn hurts!
Not a lotta cover along the coastline... I'll have to keep an eye out.
Surfing? Self-taught, just like my swordsmanship.
I hear running along the beach makes for a great workout. Wanna join me?
Look at all those fish! Wonder if they're tastyâ€¦
Want a chilled drink to cool down? I'm taking requests!
Sounds good!
My turn yet?
Leave it to me.
